main event: On 2 October 1952, an unidentified aerial object was observed for approximately 15 minutes traveling in a northwesterly direction.
interesting points: The observation was termed ground-visual and the object's course was fixed., There were no confirmed eyewitnesses reported other than the observer, who had experienced a similar sighting in Springfield, Ohio., The observer described the object as having no physical evidence left behind., The object was observed making changes in direction and speed., It was reported that the object hung in the sky and gave the impression of watching the observer.
witness description: The observer reported experiencing a similar sighting four years prior and is described as a civilian without specific expertise mentioned.
